bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to the Surgeon General, January 31, 1885

div1.p: Reed reports that he has taken up his assigned post as Post Surgeon, Fort Robinson, Nebraska.

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to the Surgeon General, January 31, 1885
div1.opener:
Fort Robinson, Neb.
January 31st 1885
Reed, Walter
Ass't. Surgeon, U.S.A.
Post Surgeon
Reports duty and
station.
234
2
* SURGEON GENERAL'S OFFICE
RECEIVED
FEB 7 1885
U.S. ARMY
Fort Robinson, Neb.
January 31st 1885.
The Surgeon General,
U.S. Army,
Washington, D.C.
Sir:
div1.p:
I have the honor to respectfully report that
during the month ending this date I have been
on duty at this post as Post Surgeon, in compliance
with S.O. No. 62, Hdqrs: Dept. of the Platte, July 22" 1884.
div1.closer:
Very respectfully,
Your obedient servant. Walter Reed, Ass't. Surgeon, U.S.A.
Post Surgeon.
